data.enText: covering or affecting the whole world

data.chText: 委员会要求全球禁止捕鲸。
data.enText: The commission is calling for a global ban on whaling.

data.chText: 这家公司在国内外的销售市场
data.enText: the company's domestic and global markets
considering or including all parts of sth

data.chText: 我们需要更全面地看这个问题。
data.enText: We need to take a more global approach to the problem.

data.chText: 在数据库中的全程检索
他们向全体职员发了一封统一的电邮。
data.enText: They sent a global email to all staff.
We need to start thinking globally.

tr: not limited or provincial in scope
example: neither national nor continental but planetary

tr: having the shape of a sphere or ball
example: little globular houses like mud-wasp nests"- Zane Gre

value.def: You can use global to describe something that happens in all parts of the world or affects all parts of the world.

example.ex: On a global scale, AIDS may well become the leading cause of infant death.
example.tran: 艾滋病很可能会成为造成全球婴儿死亡的首要原因。

value.def: A global view or vision of a situation is one in which all the different aspects of it are considered.

example.ex: ...the global view, the ability to make wider decisions based on a knowledge of all the facts, not just some of them.
example.tran: 大局观——基于全部而非部分事实作出更加宏观的决定的能力
对当代社会的总体看法

trans: 全球(气候)变暖；地球大气层变暖
总（全）体优化，全局最优化
环球网；全局网络；全球网络；全球网；全球網
全球变化；全球环境变迁；全球變化；全球转变；全球环境变化
全球定位系统(缩略形式为GPS)
地球村(指整个世界作为一个由电子通信系统连接的单一集体)
全球营销；总括（全球）销售
地球村；国际社会；全球共同体；全球社区；国际社区
